snippet: A judge plans to resentence three former Atlanta public school educators who received the stiffest sentences after they were convicted in a conspiracy to inflate student scores on standardized tests.
lead_paragraph: A judge plans to resentence three former Atlanta public school educators who received the stiffest sentences after they were convicted in a conspiracy to inflate student scores on standardized tests.

headline.main: Georgia: Resentencing for Educators in Test Cheating Scandal in Atlanta
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Resentencing for Educators in Test Cheating Scandal in Atlanta
